about_the_game:
ImmaterialAI (IAI) is a self-help and growth app that works in a completely new way: it takes you through the depths of your own mind to help you uncover and dissolve pain, confusion, worries and any other distorted or limiting perspective at a fundamental level.

Emergent uses

  • Direct Mindfulness
    Experience ultimate reality beyond any concept from your first session
  • Metaphysical therapy
    Easily overcome any negative inner states with our ontological and epistemic tools
  • Complex research/ note-taking (Plus only)
    Map data in more than infinity(cubed) dimensions under your own semantics
  • Better understand reality
    Find undogmatic God, truth, partial truths, falsehoods through AI-assisted Henosis
  • Dream journaling/ World building
    Connect pieces, contrast them, and uncover the real story
  • Dissect any system
    Map all the moving parts of a system, easily calculate if the systems fundamentally hold true

all data and functionality is stored and runs only locally, data never leaves your device

How it all works

  • 4 user paths tailored to your immediate need (Create is Plus only)
    Overcome, Beyond, Breakthrough and Create
  • Data structure similar to the brain, internet, universe
    All input in ImmaterialAI is described in either nodes or links between them, like neurons and synapses
  • Your introspection copilot
    AI-driven insights - our chat AIs and AI functions crawl through your data to expose inconsistencies, new possibilities, circular references and more
  • Multiple ways to see your mind from above
    We have auto-generated ancestry trees, automatically-detected mentions, Sanity check (Plus only) that calculates the validity of your entire library and shows you how your library is distributed under different semantics incl. post-AI validity, Clusters (Plus only) that shows your library as interconnected clusters with points of interest (cluster generation rules adjustable), the automatic graphing in Check for link (Plus only) and Big picture views, and more
  • Smartest filters in the game
    Filter by item category, focused state, old/new me data, favorites, tasks (Plus), meta models (Plus), ancestry state and more, use separately or simultaneously
  • Unlimited data definitions (Plus only)
    ImmaterialAI's Meta layer lets you rewrite and add new definitions to the structure of your data, in over infinity^3 dimensions
  • World-first functionality
    Custom tools like Is it real?, Check for link, Big Picture are only some of the many features you will not find anywhere else
  • Rich text formatting
    Use markdown to format any node. (Plus only) Use the new built-in buttons to quickly add headers, tables, images, inline IAI nodes and links, code blocks, lists, bold, breaks and more
  • Gamified self-help
    Gain experience as you use different tools, unlock more advanced tools each level

Welcome to the new you!
detailed_description:
ImmaterialAI (IAI) is a self-help and growth app that works in a completely new way: it takes you through the depths of your own mind to help you uncover and dissolve pain, confusion, worries and any other distorted or limiting perspective at a fundamental level.

Emergent uses

  • Direct Mindfulness
    Experience ultimate reality beyond any concept from your first session
  • Metaphysical therapy
    Easily overcome any negative inner states with our ontological and epistemic tools
  • Complex research/ note-taking (Plus only)
    Map data in more than infinity(cubed) dimensions under your own semantics
  • Better understand reality
    Find undogmatic God, truth, partial truths, falsehoods through AI-assisted Henosis
  • Dream journaling/ World building
    Connect pieces, contrast them, and uncover the real story
  • Dissect any system
    Map all the moving parts of a system, easily calculate if the systems fundamentally hold true

all data and functionality is stored and runs only locally, data never leaves your device

How it all works

  • 4 user paths tailored to your immediate need (Create is Plus only)
    Overcome, Beyond, Breakthrough and Create
  • Data structure similar to the brain, internet, universe
    All input in ImmaterialAI is described in either nodes or links between them, like neurons and synapses
  • Your introspection copilot
    AI-driven insights - our chat AIs and AI functions crawl through your data to expose inconsistencies, new possibilities, circular references and more
  • Multiple ways to see your mind from above
    We have auto-generated ancestry trees, automatically-detected mentions, Sanity check (Plus only) that calculates the validity of your entire library and shows you how your library is distributed under different semantics incl. post-AI validity, Clusters (Plus only) that shows your library as interconnected clusters with points of interest (cluster generation rules adjustable), the automatic graphing in Check for link (Plus only) and Big picture views, and more
  • Smartest filters in the game
    Filter by item category, focused state, old/new me data, favorites, tasks (Plus), meta models (Plus), ancestry state and more, use separately or simultaneously
  • Unlimited data definitions (Plus only)
    ImmaterialAI's Meta layer lets you rewrite and add new definitions to the structure of your data, in over infinity^3 dimensions

    Custom tools like Is it real?, Check for link, Big Picture are only some of the many features you will not find anywhere else

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Linux Distribution 2012+
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+ Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Works with APUs

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+ Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Works with APUs

name: ImmaterialAI 5

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/ 8/ 10/ 11
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+ Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Works with APUs
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“Very revolutionary, like showing electricity to people in the middle ages”
user

“I used most of what you have on display in ImmaterialAI because it was the only thing that kept me alive”
user

“So helpful if you’re willing to commit the time and face some real hard truths”
user
short_description: Welcome to the new you - ImmaterialAI unifies extensive research into metaphysics, occultism, religions & philosophies, recent studies, experiments, findings and more into the most comprehensive life-saving journaling, self-analysis, gnosis, detachment and divination platform, free and offline only.
supported_languages: English, Romanian, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Hindi, Russian, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal
